org.modelio.api.app.picking

Interface IPickingProvider


  • public interface IPickingProvider
    A picking provider is a GUI part that allows the user to select an element by a single click . The provider then calls setElement() on the PickingService that will forward the call to the IPickingClient that opened the picking session.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enterPickingMode(IPickingSession session)
      Begin a picking session.
      void leavePickingMode(IPickingSession session)
      Ends the picking session.

    • Method Detail

      • enterPickingMode

        void enterPickingMode(IPickingSession session)
        Begin a picking session. The provider must then call setElement() on the PickingService when a model element is clicked with the mouse.

      • leavePickingMode

        void leavePickingMode(IPickingSession session)
        Ends the picking session. The provider must returns to its original behavior.
